section.name: ToolWindowManager
section.p: This interface is the main entry point to manage MyDoggy. Using this interface the user can register/unregister toolwindows, groups and so on. Furthermore, the user can obtain the content manager and type descriptor templates.

section.name: Using ToolWindowManagerDescriptor
section.p:
This interface is used to modify the behaviours of the ToolWindowManager.
You can now change the push-away mode of toolwindows and set corner components. See Using page for how to.
